sentence.text: Mechanistically, lncSHGL recruited heterogeneous nuclear ribonucleoprotein A1 (positive regulation of telomere maintenance via telomerase) to enhance the translation efficiency of CALM mRNAs to increase calmodulin (negative regulation of endothelial cell proliferation) protein level without affecting their transcription, leading to the activation of the phosphatidyl inositol 3-kinase (PI3K)/positive regulation of protein phosphorylation pathway and repression of the regulation of cell growth/positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II pathway independent of insulin and calcium in hepatocytes.

entity.text: positive regulation of telomere maintenance via telomerase
negative regulation of endothelial cell proliferation
positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Hepatic positive regulation of telomere maintenance via telomerase overexpression also activated the negative regulation of endothelial cell proliferation/positive regulation of protein phosphorylation pathway and repressed the regulation of cell growth/SREBP-1C pathway to ameliorate hyperglycemia and steatosis in obese mice.

entity.text: positive regulation of telomere maintenance via telomerase
negative regulation of endothelial cell proliferation
